mutants.original_line: return ''.join([char for char in duplicates if char != '\0'])
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join([char for char in duplicates if char != '\x00'])

mutants.original_line: return ''.join([char for char in duplicates if char != '\0'])
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join([char for char in duplicates if char == '\x00'])

mutants.original_line: return ''.join([char for char in duplicates if char != '\0'])
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join([char for char in duplicates if char != ''])
